</MembersIndexItem>

<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===-- Automaton.h - Support for driving TableGen-produced DFAs ----------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This file implements class that drive and introspect deterministic finite-</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// state automata (DFAs) as generated by TableGen&#39;s -gen-automata backend.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For a description of how to define an automaton, see</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// include/llvm/TableGen/Automaton.td.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// One important detail is that these deterministic automata are created from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (potentially) nondeterministic definitions. Therefore a unique sequence of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// input symbols will produce one path through the DFA but multiple paths</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// through the original NFA. An automaton by default only returns &quot;accepted&quot; or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;not accepted&quot;, but frequently we want to analyze what NFA path was taken.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Finding a path through the NFA states that results in a DFA state can help</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// answer &#42;what&#42; the solution to a problem was, not just that there exists a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// solution.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef LLVM&#95;SUPPORT&#95;AUTOMATON&#95;H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define LLVM&#95;SUPPORT&#95;AUTOMATON&#95;H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/arrayref-h">llvm/ADT/ArrayRef.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/densemap-h">llvm/ADT/DenseMap.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/smallvector-h">llvm/ADT/SmallVector.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/allocator-h">llvm/Support/Allocator.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c51673db3dd1c6d2088fc30224393d3"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c51673db3dd1c6d2088fc30224393d3">NfaPath</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;uint64&#95;t, 4&gt;</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Forward define the pair type used by the automata transition info tables.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Experimental results with large tables have shown a significant (multiple</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// orders of magnitude) parsing speedup by using a custom struct here with a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// trivial constructor rather than std::pair&lt;uint64&#95;t, uint64&#95;t&gt;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/nfastatepair"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/nfastatepair">NfaStatePair</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/nfastatepair/#a415a4de1e497047a0bc1ac62755cdb5a"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/nfastatepair/#a415a4de1e497047a0bc1ac62755cdb5a">FromDfaState</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/nfastatepair/#ae2d65c817c3b204cf7dd21b67e7d00f7">ToDfaState</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/nfastatepair/#a0e5dc39b25cfd8c965aba317e09fe3f7"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/nfastatepair/#a0e5dc39b25cfd8c965aba317e09fe3f7">operator&lt;</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/nfastatepair">NfaStatePair</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::make&#95;tuple(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/nfastatepair/#a415a4de1e497047a0bc1ac62755cdb5a">FromDfaState</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/nfastatepair/#ae2d65c817c3b204cf7dd21b67e7d00f7">ToDfaState</a>) &lt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlight">           std::make&#95;tuple(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>.FromDfaState, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>.ToDfaState);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight">internal &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The internal class that maintains all possible paths through an NFA based</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// on a path through the DFA.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/internal/nfatranscriber"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/internal/nfatranscriber/#a2155035192d28d93e1ffe01da1cd0dc9">NfaTranscriber</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">private</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Cached transition table. This is a table of NfaStatePairs that contains</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// zero-terminated sequences pointed to by DFA transitions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;NfaStatePair&gt;</a> TransitionInfo;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// A simple linked-list of traversed states that can have a shared tail. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// traversed path is stored in reverse order with the latest state as the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// head.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight">PathSegment &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t State;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PathSegment &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cad6e9c0ff694f0fca0222e79e772b647e">Tail</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// We allocate segment objects frequently. Allocate them upfront and dispose</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// at the end of a traversal rather than hammering the system allocator.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/specificbumpptrallocator">SpecificBumpPtrAllocator&lt;PathSegment&gt;</a> Allocator;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Heads of each tracked path. These are not ordered.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::deque&lt;PathSegment &#42;&gt; Heads;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The returned paths. This is populated during getPaths.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;NfaPath, 4&gt;</a> Paths;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Create a new segment and return it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">  PathSegment &#42;makePathSegment(uint64&#95;t State, PathSegment &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cad6e9c0ff694f0fca0222e79e772b647e">Tail</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PathSegment &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a> = Allocator.Allocate();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a> = &#123;State, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cad6e9c0ff694f0fca0222e79e772b647e">Tail</a>&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Pairs defines a sequence of possible NFA transitions for a single DFA</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// transition.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> transition(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;NfaStatePair&gt;</a> Pairs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Iterate over all existing heads. We will mutate the Heads deque during</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// iteration.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumHeads = Heads.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; NumHeads; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PathSegment &#42;Head = Heads&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The sequence of pairs is sorted. Select the set of pairs that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// transition from the current head state.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa81eb67f09ee4944eaeeddbc54c0c0de">lower&#95;bound</a>(Pairs, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/nfastatepair">NfaStatePair</a>&#123;Head-&gt;State, 0ULL&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PE = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4b7d2ab11554bd10d15b6cb21b2c2787">upper&#95;bound</a>(Pairs, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/nfastatepair">NfaStatePair</a>&#123;Head-&gt;State, <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/datatypes-h/#ad0d744f05898e32d01f73f8af3cd2071">INT64&#95;MAX</a>&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For every transition from the current head state, add a new path</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// segment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (; PI != PE; ++PI)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PI-&gt;FromDfaState == Head-&gt;State)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Heads.push&#95;back(makePathSegment(PI-&gt;ToDfaState, Head));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now we&#39;ve iterated over all the initial heads and added new ones,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dispose of the original heads.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Heads.erase(Heads.begin(), std::next(Heads.begin(), NumHeads));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/internal/nfatranscriber/#a2155035192d28d93e1ffe01da1cd0dc9"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/internal/nfatranscriber/#a2155035192d28d93e1ffe01da1cd0dc9">NfaTranscriber</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;NfaStatePair&gt;</a> TransitionInfo)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">      : TransitionInfo(TransitionInfo) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/internal/nfatranscriber/#accf58263d4f716a4c46278f360647a49">reset</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/internal/nfatranscriber/#af6ccee9b562b94ba3372ddfaed335cda"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;NfaStatePair&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/internal/nfatranscriber/#af6ccee9b562b94ba3372ddfaed335cda">getTransitionInfo</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TransitionInfo;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/internal/nfatranscriber/#accf58263d4f716a4c46278f360647a49"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/internal/nfatranscriber/#accf58263d4f716a4c46278f360647a49">reset</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Paths.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Heads.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Allocator.DestroyAll();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The initial NFA state is 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Heads.push&#95;back(makePathSegment(0ULL, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/internal/nfatranscriber/#ac4c21ecdcd8d6aa8735d3dc78c4d7a9e"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/internal/nfatranscriber/#ac4c21ecdcd8d6aa8735d3dc78c4d7a9e">transition</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TransitionInfoIdx) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EndIdx = TransitionInfoIdx;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TransitionInfo&#91;EndIdx&#93;.ToDfaState != 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ++EndIdx;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;NfaStatePair&gt;</a> Pairs(&amp;TransitionInfo&#91;TransitionInfoIdx&#93;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 EndIdx - TransitionInfoIdx);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">    transition(Pairs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/internal/nfatranscriber/#aa3f872f94eff26283d42e942d703b39d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;NfaPath&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/internal/nfatranscriber/#aa3f872f94eff26283d42e942d703b39d">getPaths</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Paths.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Head : Heads) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c51673db3dd1c6d2088fc30224393d3">NfaPath</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Head-&gt;State != 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>.push&#95;back(Head-&gt;State);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Head = Head-&gt;Tail;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::reverse(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>.begin(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>.end());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Paths.push&#95;back(std::move(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Paths;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace internal</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A deterministic finite-state automaton. The automaton is defined in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// TableGen; this object drives an automaton defined by tblgen-emitted tables.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// An automaton accepts a sequence of input tokens (&quot;actions&quot;). This class is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// templated on the type of these actions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/automaton"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ActionT&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/automaton/#adbfe7e804f0c334162d71db7e2f77ded">Automaton</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Map from &#123;State, Action&#125; to &#123;NewState, TransitionInfoIdx&#125;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// TransitionInfoIdx is used by the DfaTranscriber to analyze the transition.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// FIXME: This uses a std::map because ActionT can be a pair type including</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// an enum. In particular DenseMapInfo&lt;ActionT&gt; must be defined to use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// DenseMap here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This is a shared&#95;ptr to allow very quick copy-construction of Automata; this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// state is immutable after construction so this is safe.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">MapTy = std::map&lt;std::pair&lt;uint64&#95;t, ActionT&gt;, std::pair&lt;uint64&#95;t, unsigned&gt;&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::shared&#95;ptr&lt;MapTy&gt; M;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// An optional transcription object. This uses much more state than simply</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// traversing the DFA for acceptance, so is heap allocated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::shared&#95;ptr&lt;internal::NfaTranscriber&gt; Transcriber;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The initial DFA state is 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t State = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// True if we should transcribe and false if not (even if Transcriber is defined).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Transcribe;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Create an automaton.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Transitions The Transitions table as created by TableGen. Note that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                    because the action type differs per automaton, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                    table type is templated as ArrayRef&lt;InfoT&gt;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param TranscriptionTable The TransitionInfo table as created by TableGen.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Providing the TranscriptionTable argument as non-empty will enable the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// use of transcription, which analyzes the possible paths in the original</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// NFA taken by the DFA. NOTE: This is substantially more work than simply</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// driving the DFA, so unless you require the getPaths() method leave this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// empty.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InfoT&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/automaton/#adbfe7e804f0c334162d71db7e2f77ded"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/automaton/#adbfe7e804f0c334162d71db7e2f77ded">Automaton</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;InfoT&gt;</a> Transitions,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;NfaStatePair&gt;</a> TranscriptionTable = &#123;&#125;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!TranscriptionTable.empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Transcriber =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">          std::make&#95;shared&lt;internal::NfaTranscriber&gt;(TranscriptionTable);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Transcribe = Transcriber != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">    M = std::make&#95;shared&lt;MapTy&gt;();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : Transitions)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Greedily read and cache the transition table.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">      M-&gt;emplace(std::make&#95;pair(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.FromDfaState, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.Action),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 std::make&#95;pair(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.ToDfaState, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.InfoIdx));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/automaton/#a9ade48998a5f4ef2d6c9b7ceecbe209d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/automaton/#a9ade48998a5f4ef2d6c9b7ceecbe209d">Automaton</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/automaton/#adbfe7e804f0c334162d71db7e2f77ded">Automaton</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">      : M(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>.M), State(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>.State), Transcribe(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>.Transcribe) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Transcriber is not thread-safe, so create a new instance on copy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>.Transcriber)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Transcriber = std::make&#95;shared&lt;internal::NfaTranscriber&gt;(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>.Transcriber-&gt;getTransitionInfo());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Reset the automaton to its initial state.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/automaton/#a30f80f4c7e00f9a31b9d6e6221805b4d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/automaton/#a30f80f4c7e00f9a31b9d6e6221805b4d">reset</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">    State = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Transcriber)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Transcriber-&gt;reset();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Enable or disable transcription. Transcription is only available if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// TranscriptionTable was provided to the constructor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/automaton/#ab475bbd3819025a90bd009e18988bb40"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/automaton/#ab475bbd3819025a90bd009e18988bb40">enableTranscription</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#afdccf3ff7a8dfaa084b07c1fb417bbe2a2faec1f9f8cc7f8f40d521c4dd574f49">Enable</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Transcriber &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Transcription is only available if TranscriptionTable was provided &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;to the Automaton constructor&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Transcribe = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#afdccf3ff7a8dfaa084b07c1fb417bbe2a2faec1f9f8cc7f8f40d521c4dd574f49">Enable</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Transition the automaton based on input symbol A. Return true if the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// automaton transitioned to a valid state, false if the automaton</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// transitioned to an invalid state.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If this function returns false, all methods are undefined until reset() is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// called.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/automaton/#aa2620d2287c9bf8cd15da84914af65e2"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/automaton/#aa2620d2287c9bf8cd15da84914af65e2">add</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ActionT &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = M-&gt;find(&#123;State, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> == M-&gt;end())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Transcriber &amp;&amp; Transcribe)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Transcriber-&gt;transition(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;second.second);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">    State = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;second.first;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return true if the automaton can be transitioned based on input symbol A.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = M-&gt;find(&#123;State, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != M-&gt;end();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Obtain a set of possible paths through the input nondeterministic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// automaton that could be obtained from the sequence of input actions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// presented to this deterministic automaton.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/automaton/#ad6fe99d549af75e18cd1e383e70c5beb"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;NfaPath&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/automaton/#ad6fe99d549af75e18cd1e383e70c5beb">getNfaPaths</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Can only obtain NFA paths if transcribing!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
